properties.entry: insert ignore into ap_dim(ap_mac,ap_name) ( select distinct aiwts.wlan_ap_mac, '' -- by default, current stg table does not have ap_name from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg aiwts left join ap_dim ad on aiwts.wlan_ap_mac=ad.ap_mac where ad.ap_key is null )

insert ignore into gw_iface_dim(iface_mac,iface_name) ( select distinct aiwts.wlan_mac, aiwts.wlan_essid from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg aiwts left join gw_iface_dim gid on aiwts.wlan_mac=gid.iface_mac and aiwts.wlan_essid=gid.iface_name where gid.iface_key is null )
insert ignore into date_dim(date) ( select distinct date(aiwts.poll_time) from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg aiwts left join date_dim dd on date(aiwts.poll_time)=dd.date where dd.date_key is null );

insert ignore into time_dim(time) ( select distinct time_to_sec(time(aiwts.poll_time)) from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg aiwts left join time_dim td on time_to_sec(time(aiwts.poll_time))=td.time where td.time_key is null )

insert ignore into time_dim(time) ( select distinct time_to_sec(date_format(time(aiwts.poll_time),'%H:00:00')) from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg aiwts left join time_dim td on time_to_sec(date_format(time(aiwts.poll_time),'%H:00:00'))=td.time where td.time_key is null )

insert into iface_traffic_by_hour_fact(date_key,time_key,iface_key,transmission_bytes) ( select dd.date_key, td.time_key, gid.iface_key, aiwts.transmission_bytes_val
as transmission_bytes from (%s) aiwts
join date_dim dd on dd.date_key=( select date_key from date_dim where aiwts.date=date order by date_key desc limit 1 )
join time_dim td on td.time_key=( select time_key from time_dim where aiwts.hour=time order by time_key desc limit 1 )
join gw_iface_dim gid on gid.iface_key=( select iface_key from gw_iface_dim where aiwts.wlan_mac=iface_mac and aiwts.wlan_essid=iface_name order by iface_key desc limit 1 ) ) on duplicate key update transmission_bytes=transmission_bytes+transmission_bytes_val
select * from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg order by id -- order id to get increasing time
insert into aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_archive select * from aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg
create table if not exists aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg like aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg_ingest
rename table aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg to tmp, aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg_ingest to aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg, tmp to aruba_iap_wlan_traffic_stg_ingest
